RelatedSentence: Yerevan - AGBU , the American University of Armenia ( AUA ) , and Armenia 's Ministry of Defense and Armed Forces have launched a new scholarship program that will serve soldiers and representatives of the military .
The initiative was officially announced at a recent meeting attended by AGBU Central Board member Vasken Yacoubian , Armenia 's Defense Minister Seyran Ohanyan and AUA president Dr. Bruce Boghosian .

RelatedSentence: It will include trainings for the ministry 's English language teachers ; classes for soldiers completing their last six months of service ; scholarships for ministry representatives enrolled in AUA 's undergraduate and graduate schools ; as well as professional development courses for military staff .
